views
Class MainScreenActivity

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      views.MainScreenActivity

public class MainScreenActivity
extends Activity

This is the main screen of the app. It contains a scrollable list of tasks that are visible to the user, as well as buttons to create a new task, and to update the task data using the webservice. The user can long-click on an element in the task ListView to call up a contextMenu where they can perform actions pertaining to the task.

  • Fulfill Task
  • View Task
  • Edit Task (Author only)
  • Close Task (Author only)
  • Make task public (Author only)

Author:
zturchan

onContextItemSelected

public boolean onContextItemSelected(MenuItem item)
When an option from the ContextMenu of a given task is selected, create the appropriate activity and pass it the appropriate task and index via intent. Currently only implemented for fulfill. Will also need to check if user = author for certain options (see MainScreen header).
